channel.title: Comments on: “Connect” an Excel 2010 Slicer to an unrelated object.

item.title: By: Cher
item.dc:creator: Cher
item.description: This is the first site that gives solution to my problem. However, i need some help as I am not very technical. Not sure if this is still active, please respond if you can.
item.content:encoded: This is the first site that gives solution to my problem. However, i need some help as I am not very technical. Not sure if this is still active, please respond if you can.

item.title: By: Nitin Dhamal
item.dc:creator: Nitin Dhamal
item.content:encoded:
Hi I have challange here
I have created a slicer on olap database
Named pid
I will put a numbers of pid I range a1 to a100
And this pids only selected to the slicer if pid doesn’t found then show msgbox that pid doesn’t exist in the olap cube I tried a lot

Thanx for your help
